audioFiles.transcript: El hombre con gafas come su comida lenta y felizmente.
audioFiles.translation: The man with glasses eats his food slowly and happily.

audioFiles.transcript: Un hombre gordo con gafas come su comida despacio y la disfruta.
audioFiles.translation: A fat man with glasses eats his food slowly and enjoys it.

audioFiles.transcript: Un hombre gordo con gafas come su comida en la mesa con una cara feliz.
audioFiles.translation: A fat man with glasses eats his food at the table with a happy face.

audioFiles.transcript: Un hombre gordo con gafas come su comida con una sonrisa en su cara.
audioFiles.translation: A fat man with glasses eats his meal with a smile on his face.

audioFiles.transcript: Un hombre gordo con gafas come su comida con placer y concentración.
audioFiles.translation: A fat man with glasses eats his meal with enjoyment and focus.

audioFiles.transcript: Un hombre gordo con gafas come su comida con placer y concentración.
audioFiles.translation: A fat man with glasses eats his meal with enjoyment and focus.
